tag: {display:{Name:'{"text":"巫毒箭","italic": false}',Lore:['{"text":"在箭矢落地之处散出一片半径 4 米、持续 3.5 秒","color":"gray","italic": false}','[{"text":"的毒沼，向其中的生物附加","color":"gray","italic": false},{"text":"中毒","underlined":true},{"text":"（每 0.5 秒受到","color":"dark_gray","italic": false}]','{"text":"1 点伤害，但中毒不会致死，会残留一点生命值；","color":"dark_gray","italic": false}','[{"text":"持续伤害类效果均不叠加）","color":"dark_gray","italic": false},{"text":"与","color":"gray","italic": false},{"text":"不祥之兆","underlined":true,"color":"gray"},{"text":"（无法静息","color":"dark_gray","italic": false}]','[{"text":"","color":"gray","italic": false},{"text":"治疗）","color":"dark_gray","italic": false},"。敌方持续 5 秒，友方持续 1 秒。"]','""','[{"text":"✳ 冷却  ","italic": false,"color":"aqua"},{"text":"28 秒 (白昼) /","italic": false,"color":"dark_gray"},{"text":" 12 秒 (夜晚)","italic": false,"color":"white"}]','[{"text":"⚜ 储存  ","italic": false,"color":"gold"},{"text":"2 支","italic": false,"color":"white"}]','[{"text":"❤ 伤害  ","italic": false,"color":"red"},{"text":"9 - 16.5（满弦）+ 12（中毒）","italic": false,"color":"white"}]','[{"text":"✏ 细节  按 [","color":"dark_gray","italic": false},{"keybind":"key.drop"}, "] 收起详情"]']},HideFlags:63}
